General.Name: Digital China Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Digital China Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of computer hardware and supporting parts in China. It provides network, multimedia, electronic information and communication, office automation equipment, instruments and meters, electrical appliances, and printing phototypesetting equipment, as well as computer application systems installation and maintenance. The company also offers technical consultation and services, and technology transfer of self-produced products; operates import and export business; and engages in the agency sales of computer hardware, software, and peripheral facilities, as well as self-produced products. In addition, the company provides technology development of communication equipment, electronics, and computer accessories; and engages in research and development of computer software, information technology, system integration, office automation, and integrated wiring technology. Further, it offers investing services; develops and operates real estates that has legally obtained the right to use. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Shenxin Taifeng Group Co., Ltd and changed its name to Digital China Group Co., Ltd. in April 2016. Digital China Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
